actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with the authority to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the costs of eye examination programs to detect glaucoma for the elderly.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the cost of glaucoma detection eye examinations administered by nonprofit or public agencies to residents who are at least 65 years of age.

titles.title: A bill to provide the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare with the authority to make grants to States and local communities to pay for the costs of eye examination programs to detect glaucoma for the elderly.
